text:
@RahulGandhi COVID-19 Coronavirus Outbreak in India and MPLAD Funds: Can Indian Democracy Survive a Virus Attack? | OPINION
I totally agree with Tathagata. Doing away of MPLAD Funds is unacceptable and must be resisted by MP/MLAs of all political parties. Undemocratic https://t.co/ElOquueopK
